price: Ǹjẹ́ ìyẹn l’ó lóore jùlọ ní ibùdésí ni tàbí igi zaƙūm (igi ẹlẹ́gùn-ún)?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
